Material used.Description: PET scan using [18F]FP-CIT to assess dopamine uptake in the striatum.

Readout description.Result Description: Dopamine uptake was reduced by 40% in the striatum for the variant NM_000065.3:c.192G>T.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: [18F]FP-CIT was used as a positive control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Dopamine uptake greater than 80% in the striatum.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Dopamine uptake less than 60% in the striatum.

Material used.Description: Western Blot analysis of DJ1 protein expression.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 50% for the variant NM_000065.3:c.192G>T.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
